channel.title: 3D artist available to help
channel.description: hello, my name is andy bosold. you may find my website here at: [url='www.bosoldworld.com']www.bosoldworld.com[/url] currently im the lead artist on the crysis mod [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/mechwarrior-living-legends']MechWarrior Living Legends[/url]. i think i speak for several of the MWLL devs when i say we are fans of your guys work and we would love to help with testing if it is needed :wink: haha. many of us are quite experienced gamers as well as game developers and i know that good testers are hard to come by. so please shoot me an email if you need anyone to help out.

item.title: 3D artist available to help
item.dc:creator: andybozo
item.description:
GordonF.:

wow… awesome! u should change the trailer its 2010 not 2009

heh, yea we barely made it in time for '09 haha. it was worth putting in that extra time though, the game is pretty darn fun. most of our team has just stopped working and plays the game most every day now.

Read full topic

item.title: 3D artist available to help
item.dc:creator: Omega_Absolute
item.description:
andybozo:

hello, my name is andy bosold. you may find my website here at: www.bosoldworld.com currently im the lead artist on the crysis mod MechWarrior Living Legends. i think i speak for several of the MWLL devs when i say we are fans of your guys work and we would love to help with testing if it is needed haha. many of us are quite experienced gamers as well as game developers and i know that good testers are hard to come by. so please shoot me an email if you need anyone to help out.

I’d send Ram or another Dev to get their attention.

Read full topic

item.title: 3D artist available to help
item.dc:creator: andybozo
item.description:
i cant say i remember you :[ but it is possible we have posted on eachothers threads or something… your handle isnt fimilar though. we did just release MWLL and would like to invite everyone possible to join in the fun playing our mod. especially we wouldnt mind getting feed back from some guys who actually know what they are doing from black mesa team.

Read full topic

item.title: 3D artist available to help
item.dc:creator: The_Assassin47
item.description:
Uh, hey man. You might remember me from Crysis-Online or inCrysis or something.
I’ve been wondering, are you guys still doin the mod?
Any release ideas?

Read full topic
